tool.name: qiime2 feature-classifier classify-consensus-blast

param.name: maxaccepts
param.label: maxaccepts: Int % Range(1, None)
param.help: [default: 10] Maximum number of hits to keep for each query. Must be in range [1, infinity]. BLAST will choose the first N hits in the reference database that exceed perc_identity similarity to query.

param.name: perc_identity
param.label: perc_identity: Float % Range(0.0, 1.0, inclusive_end=True)
param.help: [default: 0.8] Reject match if percent identity to query is lower. Must be in range [0.0, 1.0].

param.name: query_cov
param.label: query_cov: Float % Range(0.0, 1.0, inclusive_end=True)
param.help: [default: 0.8] Reject match if query alignment coverage per high-scoring pair is lower. Note: this uses blastn's qcov_hsp_perc parameter, and may not behave identically to the query_cov parameter used by classify-consensus-vsearch. Must be in range [0.0, 1.0].

param.name: strand
param.label: strand: Str % Choices('both', 'plus', 'minus')
param.help: [default: 'both'] Align against reference sequences in forward ("plus"), reverse ("minus"), or both directions ("both").

param.name: evalue
param.label: evalue: Float
param.help: [default: 0.001] BLAST expectation value (E) threshold for saving hits.

param.name: min_consensus
param.label: min_consensus: Float % Range(0.5, 1.0, inclusive_start=False, inclusive_end=True)
param.help: [default: 0.51] Minimum fraction of assignments must match top hit to be accepted as consensus assignment. Must be in range (0.5, 1.0].

tool.help:
QIIME 2: feature-classifier classify-consensus-blast ==================================================== BLAST+ consensus taxonomy classifier
Outputs: -------- :classification.qza: Taxonomy classifications of query sequences.
|
Description: ------------ Assign taxonomy to query sequences using BLAST+. Performs BLAST+ local alignment between query and reference_reads, then assigns consensus taxonomy to each query sequence from among maxaccepts hits, min_consensus of which share that taxonomic assignment. Note that maxaccepts selects the first N hits with > perc_identity similarity to query, not the top N matches. For top N hits, use classify-consensus-vsearch.
|
